unRxLib 275 1.0.21

https://www.micrel.cz/RxLib/
https://www.micrel.cz/RxLib/dfiles.htm 
    Last stable version of RxLibrary for Delphi 2005, 2006, 2007, 2009, 2010, XE1..XE8, 10-Seattle, 10.1-Berlin, 10.2-Tokyo, 10.3-Rio, 10.4-Sydney and 11-Alexandria
    Unofficial version  to download from there "unRxLib 275 1.0.21"   (1.09 MB).
    © 2021 Jaro Benes 

-> unrxlib_275_u_1_0_21.rar
-> micrel@micrel.cz

Note: 
 There is a version in Github, from Andry-Smirnov:  https://github.com/Andry-Smirnov/RXLib-Delphi
 It is based in UnRxLib:
 <<
  Unofficial version Rx library for Delphi 2005/2006/2007/2009/2010/XE/XE2/XE3/XE4/XE5/XE6/XE7/XE8/Seattle/Berlin/Tokyo/Rio © 2018 Jaro Benes
  (from   http://micrel.cz/RxLib/dfiles.htm)
  >>

  But it is not up to date with the last version of unRxLib 275 (1.0.21)
